author: GamingBolt
description:
Even for long-time fans of the franchise, it feels like Patapon 1 + 2 could have aspired to more. If you're truly keen on revisiting the classics, if only to witness the more unorthodox side of PlayStation, it may be worth checking out. 

But those who want to recapture the magic from the old days of the PlayStation Portable may find it somewhat lacking, whether it's in terms of the gameplay and various annoyances or the amount of effort put into both remasters.
title: PATAPON 1+2 REPLAY PS5 Review - The Final Verdict

author: GamingBolt
description:
Destiny 2 is back, or rather, it never really went away. Bungie has been steadily delivering new content to mixed success, but on July 15th, The Edge of Fate, the latest expansion, drops, providing a new campaign, activities, and destination. Granted, it's nowhere near the scale of The Final Shape or even The Witch Queen in terms of content. However, you can still expect new Exotics, weapon frames, and a brand-new raid. Perhaps more intriguing is the significant overhaul of pretty much every aspect of the game (yes, another one). Armor will get set bonuses, tiers, and archetypes to diversify build-crafting while stats are completely overhauled.

The Portal offers a new way to access activities and select different difficulties, complete with modifiers to increase the challenge and rewards. That's not even getting into the new Artifact, Masterworking changes, Power changes, and - at long last - the shooting range. Join us as we examine all the biggest changes and new features.
title: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate - 15 Things YOU NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy

author: GamingBolt
description:
Months and months after its announcement, we finally received an in-depth look and extensive gameplay for Ghost of Yotei. Launching on October 2nd for PS5 but set over 300 years later in Ezo, it follows Atsu, a wandering mercenary on the path of vengeance. 

While you can expect realistic combat and a massive open world to explore, how does Ghost of Yotei set itself apart from Tsushima? Here are ten new things we've learned, some of which are game-changing for long-time fans.
title: Ghost of Yotei Is Looking Amazing, Here Are 10 NEW Details You May Not Know
